thread.title: 31 scary movies you can rent tonight... if you dare
thread.title_full: 31 scary movies you can rent tonight... if you dare - seattlepi.com

author: Andrea Waguespack
title: 31 scary movies you can rent tonight... if you dare
text:
Halloween is right around the corner, but you don't have to wait until that Saturday to get your spook on.
With these 31 movies at your fingertips, you don't need a Ouija board or magic spell book to conjure up a scary evening.
RELATED: New movies hit rental shelves this October
Take a look the scary (and not-s0-scary) movies available to rent on Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, Redbox and HBO NOW this month in the gallery above.
